Service Details: - Protects consumers, encourages fair business practices, and enforces protection laws in BC- Responds to inquiries and complaints from BC consumers and businesses- Educates consumers and businesses about their rights and responsibilities- Licences specific industries and inspects these licenced industries to ensure they are complying with BC's consumer protection laws- Investigates alleged violations of consumer protection laws and follows up with progressive enforcement action- Provides film content information so the public can make informed viewing choices for themselves and their families- Recommends enhancements to BC's consumer protection laws to the provincial government
Address & Map: 3450 Uptown Blvd, #307Victoria, BC     V8Z 0B9View MapQuest Map
Former Name: Business Practices and Consumer Protection Authority
